General.Name: Contextlogic Inc
General.Description: ContextLogic Inc. operates as a mobile ecommerce company in Europe, North America, South America, and internationally. The company operates Wish, an ecommerce platform that connects users to merchants. It also provides marketplace and logistics services to merchants. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: One Sansome Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94104
